![Download button](Images/img_downarrow.png){width=30}

## HerbVar Datasheets {#sec-datasheets}

Use the links to download datasheets for data collection and/or entry

- [HerbVar XLSX Datasheet for electronic data entry](https://github.com/HerbVar-Network/herbvar_manual/blob/main/forms/HerbVar_Datasheet_Template.xlsx)

- [PRIMARY Datasheet (PDF), printable for use in field](https://github.com/HerbVar-Network/herbvar_manual/blob/main/forms/HV_PRIMARY_Datasheet.pdf)

- [REPRO Datasheet (PDF), printable for use in field](https://github.com/HerbVar-Network/herbvar_manual/blob/main/forms/HV_REPRO_Datasheet.pdf)

- [HERBIVORE Datasheet (PDF), printable for use in field](https://github.com/HerbVar-Network/herbvar_manual/blob/main/forms/HV_HERBIVORE_Datasheet.pdf)
